page.title: 20A STABLEHAND
page.content: My name is Averil,I am 14yrs old and on Saturdays I help at the nearby racing stables.When I leave school I hope to get a job there.I arrive at 6.30a.m.and get my horse ready for exercise;10.30a.m.we arrive back and wash down the horses.Then we clean tack for the next day;in the afternoon we groom them.By 4.00p.m. they are ready for feeding and then mucking out for the night,so they don't go to bed on a wet floor. I enjoy this job because I like working with horses especially race horses.
